document.full_text: the gray wolf will become the first creature ever removed from the u.s. endangered species list by an act of congress, rather than by scientific review, under legislation sent to the white house on thursday.
document.title: u.s. poised to lift federal protections for wolves
lines_and_colors: the gray wolf will become the first creature ever removed from the u.s. endangered species list by an act of congress, rather than by scientific review, under legislation sent to the white house on thursday.
